page.title: 12Our Local Postman
page.content: {Mr Charlton,}or Anty as he is better known,has been a 'Shire postman now for{37 years.}His day starts at{6.15, when he goes to Hexham to collect the mail and sorts it ready for delivery.He covers the{Steel}postal area-in fact,Steel Post Office is one room in his house, and his wife is postmistress!For the first 20 years,he did his round on foot or bicycle. He says his most exciting day was when he first got a post van.He visits way-out farms-at one there are 4 gates to open and close- and he very much enjoys his life. He lends a hand with all sorts of things on his rounds, a difficult lambing, digging people out of snowdrifts, and helping the elderly, and he is a welcome arrival everywhere.Sometimes he has been chased by bulls or tups,amusing afterwards but not at the time!
